name: Corridor (razeltif)
description:
Corridor is a small walking game where you explore the seemingly endless depths of a manor. Will you be able to get out?

Controls :

  • W A S D to move
  • Shift to run
  • E to open doors

Credits :

  • Razeltif
  • Nemix
  • Makazy
  • Vladirien

Made for the CFN Halloween gamejam
